root.name: The Path of Kara
root.description: OverviewThe Path of Kara is a puzzle game developed and published by Anshar Studios for the Windows Phone platform.PlotThe player takes control of Kara, a young shaman girl. Kara's village is in danger and she must go on a quest to save it.GameplayThe Path of Kara is a match three puzzle game in which the player swaps tiles on a board trying to match three or more of the same. The Path of Kara includes some levels that are straight match three style, but also includes levels in which specific puzzles must be solved or bosses must be defeated.
